guess.name: Guess Number
guess.helpText1: You need to guess 4 different numbers.
guess.helpText4: If you guess 0128, you can get 1A0B
guess.helpText5: If you guess 5627, you can get 2A1B
guess.helpText6: Every game has 8 times to guess.
guess.helpText7: Less times guessed right, more stars got.

slide.name: Slide
slide.helpText1: You can use a finger swipe to look for more than three pieces of digital color that are connected together and erase it.
